Reviews.Title: “Quiet and magnificent hotel for a magnificent stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: abel7
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the GOLDEN CROWN hotel during a week, the service was excellent and the staff was very nice, especially desk clerk and the maitre of hotel. The room was very appropriate(clean), the bathroom also and the very comfortable bed as. For his location he is in the center of sultanhammet, All the places of interest are near the hotel I recommend you the GOLDEN CROWN hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good for budget”
Reviews.Author: First_Advice
Reviews.Content: Though it is good for budget better chooces are there. Consider Aziyadi hotel, if your budget permits Breakfast is simple and the room is small The place is clean. Basically, if you do not mind no frills stay, it is good choice.

Reviews.Title: “lovely stay at Golden Crown”
Reviews.Author: Aimee71
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Golden Crown hotel 23-27 march 2012. We had an excellent stay in this hotel. The room was spacious enough and had a clean bathroom with a good shower. Nice, comfortable beds and everything we needed. The tv had several foreign stations in different languages, even a Dutch one! The staff in the hotel was very friendly and helpfull with all our questions. Breakfast was different from what we are used to in other European cities, but we love to adept to local eating habits, so it was wonderfull, with the lovely Turkish bread, feta, cucumber and tomatoes. But for people who want their cereal or toast, this is also available on the buffet. The situation of the hotel was ideal: very near to a tramstop, but lots of things, like the Sultanahmet camii and the Hagia Sophia were in walking distance of the hotel. At the same time, it is quiet at night. At the last day we left in the afternoon, but after we checked out of our rooms, we could leave our luggage in the hotel, so we could do some more site-seeing before leaving for the airport. We loved Istanbul and will probably return here sometime. We will stay at the golden crown again next time. Thank you, Demet and colleagues!

Reviews.Title: “Magnificent service and great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: BurÃ§ak Ã–
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for a week. Since the moment I came in and the moment I left the personel provided us with magnificent service, they were super friendly and managed to give us a great feeling about this hotel. It is not a big hotel, but it sure is clean. The Golden Crown hotel has a very good location, within 10 minutes (walking) you'll find yourself at the Grand Bazaar, Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. The food was simple but also good. Remember, this is a hotel for a citytrip, not a resort!! I would rate this hotel with a 10, excellent, you name it! And I'm sure I will visit this hotel more often. I would recommend this hotel definitely for those who dont want to pay more than needed. Wait, what am I saying, I recommend this hotel to everyone! Thank you for the great and friendly service Golden Crown members!

Reviews.Title: “good personal, good location, clean rooms, near to most important mosques.”
Reviews.Author: calinandron
Reviews.Content: Personal OK, location OK, internet OK, well conected to city tours. Rooms have not so good phonic isolation. Breakfast ok.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!!!”
Reviews.Author: Liza L
Reviews.Content: Well that was a relieve after all the trips in Turkey. What can I say? Staff perfect, very friendly and helpfull. Early check in was fortunately available as well. Helped us to change the money, gave all the information about location of places we were interested in. Ms. Demet was excellent example of a good Manager at the reception. Very professional. There was a boy who did a waiter at the breakfast, bell boy, guided us to hamam near by etc. Rooms are very clean and has all whats nessesary. I would deffinetely come back with my friends.

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for location close to historical sites, an exquisite service and pleasant staff you are at the best p”
Reviews.Author: Nina K
Reviews.Content: We would like to compliment Golden Crown Hotel and hotel's staff on the wonderful service we received during our stay in Istanbul. My husband and I have spent four wonderful days in Istanbul which we will never forget and the hotelâ€™s staff had contributed that our staying was even more pleasant. They were always there to give us hand and proper advice, when needed. Due to the bad weather, my husband flight was delayed and he came late o the hotel. On our request, without any problems one of the guys brought us sandwiches at 2 AM that night with a big smile on his face. Although all hotelâ€™s staff were exquisite we must say that we met the most pleasant front desk person ever, named Demet. It really makes a huge difference when someone acknowledges your presence and thatâ€™s what she did. Every morning we were greeted upon leaving the hotel and again upon our return. She always had a smile on her face and was glad to help with any questions or problems that we had. We would definitely stay there again! Damir and Nina, Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: maevm
Reviews.Content: Friendly people, perfect location, clean rooms ... We were really suprised how good our stay had been.

Reviews.Title: “First Class Hotel & Staff”
Reviews.Author: AnneMoonandStars
Reviews.Content: I spent 10 magnificent days in Golden Crown Hotel Istanbul and I could not have been looked after better than I was in this hotel. I arrived as a guest but was treated as a friend/family member by all the staff especially Sales & Marketing Manager, Demet and Nilgun, General Manager. They were so friendly and helpful and seen that our honeymoon stay was a apecial occasion. The other staff Memet, Kurban, Recep and Kann were equally helpful and friendly and nothing was too much for them to ensure our stay was a memorable occasion! It is ideally located and the accommodation and food was excellent. Thank you all so much for making our visit a 'home-from-home'...I look forward to my return visit to my new Turkish 'family' in Golden Crown, much love and many thanks, Anne & Neset xxx

Reviews.Title: “Clean & Good Location”
Reviews.Author: chillu23
Reviews.Content: The rooms are well laid out, and are a good match for city travellers who treat it as their "crash pad". Unfortunately the aircon in our room didn't allow cooling, so it got quite sauna-like during the night (even in Turkish winter). The bathroom light transformers (?) are making a hell of a noise, so I found it difficult to sleep even with the noise of lights in the neighbouring room. Location is great, just a short walk from Cemberlitas tram station.

Reviews.Title: “Small and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Alf F
Reviews.Content: Some slight language problems but in the main we were well looked after. The hotel did provide Brakfast which was included in our deal. Not a great deal of variety but adequate to meet our needs. The hotel is located very near to all the main attractions which you can do on foot. The room was a little on the small side but clean and functional. The staff were very pleasant and responded quickly to any requests. It is ideal for tourists on a budget. There is a good public transport system but be aware that you buy tickets before you travel and it is as well to plan your journey before hand to ensure you have enough tickets to get you ther and back. We bought what we thought was a Rover Ticket which was nothing of the sort. When we got on the bus for our return journey all sorts of noises came from the ticket machine, our tickets were only singles. Thankfully a young man came to our aid and used his pass to prevent us being thrown off.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel in the heart of the Old City”
Reviews.Author: sherry_riosa
Reviews.Content: This is for sure one of the very nice, comfortable and lovely hotel in the heart of the city. I regret that we only stayed for one night as part of the one day post tour in istabul. Demet, the lovely lady in the counter made us feel so at home. Even offered us to have breakfast upon checked-in :) The room that we had are ok for 2 person, small but very ergonomic... no wasted space, enough to have to large suitcase and the two of us comfortably going around the room. The breakfast was good- basic but enough to keep you till the next meal. They also have free internet at the lobby and wifi in the room. Location is 10 minutes comfortable walking to the Blue mosque the hagia sofia. Every sites that you need to visit are within the vicinity. Demet, thanks so much for making our one day in the old city such a wonderful one. I hope to be able to visit istanbul again. I never forget what you said to me, that for you, being in the reception is not just greeting guest, its your way of life. That is why yo made so many traveler who stayed in the hotel feel so at home. Thanks and good luck !

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Golden Crown”
Reviews.Author: Obaid Q
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 10 nights in Jan 2012. We found this hotel very comfortable and the staff helpful and friendly. Would recommend it if you want to be near the Blue Mosque and many other surrounding attractions. The room was clean, spacious and comfortable, with clean towels provided every day. Especially breakfast was very much delicious and kind hospitality. I would like to thank Murat and Demet very lovely and soft spoken staff.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in Sultanahmet area”
Reviews.Author: Cori G
Reviews.Content: We went to this hotel after having slept six nights in Sultanhamet Park Hotel. As this last one, it's very well situated, I mean you are close to everything : at the heart of the old town, you just have to walk three minutes from the hotel to the tramstation to take the tramway to go to the modern part of Istanbul. Nice and quiet place, big rooms, friendly and helpful staff. We recommand you this place. C and C from France and Spain

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel at a very good price at the heart of old Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Alma D
Reviews.Content: I am regular guest of Golden Crown Hotel (situated at the center of the historical center of Istanbul, very close to the Blue Mosque) and would like to recommend it to everybody as the prices are not high and the roooms are very clean and nice. I also higly recommend the hotel and reception staff as they are always kind and ready to help and give any kind of advice to the guests. Alma

Reviews.Title: “Location , location , location ....”
Reviews.Author: JippJocce_mnsaa
Reviews.Content: Perfect location I have ever seen .. We went to Ä°stanbul last week with our school trip to Sultanahmet . Our Tour Agency was choosed for us Golden Crown Hotel . While we were reaching there it was night and we were not aware to way . But next day when our trip began , the location was fascinated us .Only 2 minutes to historical area ..We visited lots of places that valuable to see .It was so beneficial to learn about Ä°stanbul history for us .The hotel was so nice for hospitality . Receptionist ,the young beautiful lady was so professional making our check in hotel . Then she gaved us all directions about everthing would be done .Rooms were not bigger than we hoped but ok. Also clean enough to stay . Breakfast was very delicious with cookies . Finally we were so pleased to stay there . And we could suggest there for everyone . We choose it for our next trips . Thanks to everything.

Reviews.Title: “â€œa fine hotel with a nice reception deskâ€�”
Reviews.Author: Zhanna D
Reviews.Content: A clean hotel, very good situated, with a fine crew always ready to help you where possible. Thank you very much Ms. Demet and Mr. Masum Zhanna Dokholyan Armenia, Yerevan

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: sirlordlongford
Reviews.Content: We stayed here pre cruise and post cruise a good location.Will stay here again. Only 10 Lira from hotel to airport.

Reviews.Title: “Golden Crown is like a Crown Jewel in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Carol K
Reviews.Content: We had no previous knowledge of this hotel having booked it blind from on line reviews and from our travel agent, and our cab driver had a bit of trouble finding it but boy were we surprised when we found it. The location is maybe a pleasant 1 and a half block walk from the main tram line where it seems you can get anywhere on that line. It is easily walkable to all the major sights just like they claim it is. We found out later that it is one of the "small boutique hotels" that are in the main area of the Sultanahmet which is the most desirable areas for tourists wishing to see the most popular sights. But, while not cheap, it is the most economical hotel that we found in the area. We were very pleased with the cleanliness, the breakfast was nice, the reception area is small but comfortably furnished with couches and a big screen TV, We especially liked the free use of their house computer and it was very user friendly enabling us to keep in touch with our family every day. Other hotels we stayed in had many more computers but were forever having problems with bad or lost connections, or broken keyboards, etc. Demmit at the front desk was a joy to meet and always greeted us with a smile every morning at breakfast. She was also like our personal concierge and not only had a good knowledge of the area she was very fluent in English which was very helpful to us. All in all I would definitely recommend this jewel of a place but hope that not too many go there because we plan on going back again and again and I am hoping they will always have room for us at a decent price.

Reviews.Title: “a fine hotel with a nice reception desk”
Reviews.Author: peter l
Reviews.Content: a clean hotel, very good situated, with a fine crew always ready to help you where possible, grtz Peter Labens, Belgium

Reviews.Title: “BEST OF BEST”
Reviews.Author: NawabLaghari
Reviews.Content: I am a travellor and luckily I found this Hotel in Istanbul I have stayed 3 times on different dates since 2010 and it has a very efficient and co operative and courties staff with clean hotel rooms and big breakfast.location right in the center of the city all attractions near by with best restuaraunts and shopping Grand bazar nearby.I highly recommend this hotel you will not regerts your stay for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise”
Reviews.Author: Alf F
Reviews.Content: When we first entered the areaa we had some misgivings However, we soon settled in. The room was clean, a little on the small side but comfortable with efficient airconditioning. The staff in the main wee most attentive and helptful. Continental Breakfast was limited in its selection but adequate for a short stay. We would recomend this hotel to anybody visiting Istanbul to see the sites, they are very near at hand. Restuarants and bars in the area served good food. One word of caution, if you like a drink with your meal ensure alchohol is served in the establishment before you sit down, not all serve alchohol. As a rough rule of thumb if the menu is cheap it is because they don't serve drink. A useful tip for those that like to travel around by local bus, by your tickets before entering the bus - all tickets are one way so you need two to get back. The tram service is good, to travel on them you need tokens whcih can be obtained from the machine at the stops. It is always useful to have a pocket full of Turkish Lira coins in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: “Good location for the sights.”
Reviews.Author: Bazza099
Reviews.Content: We spent 3 nights here as apart of a two centre holiday - the rooms are compact but clean - although the air conditioning struggles to keep the rooms at a comfotable temperature. The staff are friendly, helpful and efficient. The breakfast is OK although the eating area is rather humid without any natural lighting. The central location of the Hotel (once our taxi driver mamanged to find it!) is excellent to get to most of the major attractions in Istanbul and once you get a decent map - you are a few minutes walk from them. Very good value for money hotel as long as you do not intend spending much time in your room.

Reviews.Title: “As it said on the tin.”
Reviews.Author: merrywood6
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed for 4 nights at the end of August on our first visit to Istanbul. As already stated while the room may be on the small side, it was clean and tidy.The hotel provides a good base for exploring, being very close to the sights, so if you want a no frills base it is recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Above my expectations”
Reviews.Author: Elsbeth13
Reviews.Content: Anybody who is looking for accommodation in Istanbul and wants to be near the Bazaars, trams or just for walking around to the Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and other Mosques and feel real safe should try the Golden Crown Hotel. We did not have a room with a view, but this was not bad at all. The room was comfortable. It had air conditioning (neccesary for August as it can get pretty hot outside and also inside if you do not have air conditioning). There is a safe in the room and the bathroom had a shower which was very nice with lots of hot water. There was even a hair dryer. So no need to bring one along. The room service is excellent with nice friendly ladies who comes in everyday to make your bed. When you are in the room and the lights are on and someone opens your door an alarm goes off, which is very good. The food is excellent and the choice is big. Thanks for a wonderful stay and I can recommend this place to anyone. I travel a lot and have experienced many places but this place was above my expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Whenever I will go to Istanbul, I will stay in Golden Crown Hotel”
Reviews.Author: asifpilot1
Reviews.Content: Hotel is small but good with clean environment. Most of the tourist attractions are on walking distance. Hotel staff is very friendly. Me and my family enjoyed stay at Golden Crown Hotel, Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Good all round hotel and close to the city”
Reviews.Author: debseal
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights in May 2011. We found this hotel very comfortable and the staff helpful and friendly. Would recommend it if you want to be near the Blue Mosque and many other surrounding attractions. The room was clean, spacious and comfortable, with clean towels provided every day. We stayed on a bed and breakfast rate and the breakfast was adequate.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, decent hotel, very friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: Victorkoppelmans
Reviews.Content: As a family we were first located at different levels. Our travelagent made that mistake. They changed it as soon as possible. The airco made a lot of noise. But the rest was very okÃ©! And the staff was very nice to the children.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely perfect!”
Reviews.Author: VHGKSBN
Reviews.Content: We stayed at The Golden Crown for 5 days when we were in Istanbul on a school trip in March 2011. The hotel was an excellent choice - perfect location because everything was in walking distance, rooms were comfortable and very clean, delicious and abundant breakfast and last, but not least, the staff were always helpful. They arranged airport transfer and when - with one day's notice - we wanted to find a place that could accomodate 30 students and 2 teachers and serve Turkish food, they arranged that as well. We are quite sure that next time we go to Istanbul - whether it is another school trip or a private tour - we'll stay at this hotel. Kirsten SÃ¸rensen & Bente Nielsen, Vesthimmerlands Gymnasium, Denmark

Reviews.Title: “Very good location, don't miss it if it's available”
Reviews.Author: kmehmet
Reviews.Content: I was there at many times with friends or with my wife and I can only recommand this hotel. The location is perfect, when you leave the hotel, you turn left and walk for only 3 minutes to the entrance of the grand bazaar, and you have to turn right and walk for only 2 minutes to be at the blue mosque. Hotel's members are friendly and room are very clean. En franÃ§ais pour ceux qui veulent: en un seul mot : PARFAIT :) Si vous souhaitez vous promenez dans la ville historique d'Istanbul et que cet hÃ´tel ci est disponible ne le ratez surtout pas.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels in the city.”
Reviews.Author: Kathleen072
Reviews.Content: Excellent location for the most popular sights of the city. Very comfortable accomodation,Excellent food and best of all - very friendly and helpful staff. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Ä±t was perfect”
Reviews.Author: fatih_erden
Reviews.Content: i have spent 4 days in this hotel i felt that really i'm at home , nice people , great hospitality , perfect position to go everywhere , very near by the most famous places in Istanbul like AYASOPHIA , BLUE MOSQUE , GRAND BAZAAR AND THE SEA ALSO , very good and helpful crew in everything starting from reception , restaurant and the cleaning services , so i would like to thank all of those people who made us to feel we r in our home really and be sure when i will go to Istanbul again i will be in GOLDEN CROWN HOTEL . thanks again ,,FATÄ°H ERDEN

Reviews.Title: “GREAT , WONDERFUL , FREINDLY , HELPFUL AND PERFECT”
Reviews.Author: MohamedElsamny
Reviews.Content: i have spent 4 days in this hotel i felt that really i'm at home , nice people , great hospitality , perfect position to go everywhere , very near by the most famous places in Istanbul like AYASOPHIA , BLUE MOSQUE , GRAND BAZAAR AND THE SEA ALSO , very good and helpful crew in everything starting from reception , restaurant and the cleaning services , so i would like to thank all of those people who made us to feel we r in our home really and be sure when i will go to Istanbul again i will be in GOLDEN CROWN HOTEL . thanks again ,, Mohamed Elsamny

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, but...”
Reviews.Author: andreealisievici
Reviews.Content: This is by no means a bad hotel. It is good, clean and close to what one would like to visit in Istanbul. However, for the same money you can get better deals, since Golden Crown has really small rooms, and is on a crowded street where you will be bother by car noise and where you will be woken up at 6 in the morning by prayer calls. Also, Piyer Loti street is not one of the nicest in the area. So overall, although it is not a bad hotel at all, having been also to others in the same area I wouldn't recommend this.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION-HOT STUFFY HOTEL-COOL CLEAN ROOMS-BREAKFAST !!!”
Reviews.Author: CHRISANDANN
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights before going on to North Cyprus. When we arrived the temperature in the reception area was very very hot and was a bit scruffy.The welcome was pleasant and friendly. The air conditioning was not effective in the reception dining area and we felt that this may be a "Hot Hell Hole" for the duration. However, once we were taken to our room on the 3rd floor, I was very surprised as to how clean it was. It was spotless and the room air con was working fine, so even though the room was not very large, it was fine for the 4 nights. There was a restaurant in the hotel and a bar, but during our time there, we saw no one using either. Perhaps the heat / stuffyness in the hotel was enough to keep people out and not in !!. Breakfast was a weird combination of all sorts of things. The portable air con unit in the breakfast area was working, but we felt that the food had been out on the self serve area for some time (cheeses / meats / bread etc), so we were very cautious as to what we picked ( I did not really fancy a plate of olives for Breakfast). The coffee was almost undrinkable and my wife used her own English teabags. They did have a notice up to ask how the could improve the breakfast menu-but I did not make any suggestions as I forgot to do this. The location is brilliant for visiting the "Sights". Overall,we were happy with the stay, but only as a base to sleep. As the stay was part of a multi-location break, the cost was in with the package, so no idea what it would be to pay for this hotel as a seperate cost.If you are only looking for a clean, cool room to sleep, then it's great. For food and customer relaxing in the hotel public areas, then be careful, its not really the place to stay. It has free internet access on their public computer in reception, so good for keeping up to date with your emails. Staff were polite and helpful and so we were happy to put up with the other quirks as mentioned above.

Reviews.Title: “Good three stars hotel”
Reviews.Author: karamella54
Reviews.Content: I spent 4 nights in Golden Crown hotel with my husband. Previously I read all comments on this hotel, good ones and bad ones too. I was wondering what is the truth. Facts: very good location, 2 minutes walking to Cimberlitas tram station. 1 stop from Blue Mosque, Aya Sofia, Topkapi Palace, etc, 10 minutes walking from Grand Bazar. View is not the best - there was an ugly building on the opposite side, it's a factory or something like thet. Shops are near. Rooms and bathroom are very small - but clean and friendly. If you travel for a long time with lots of baggage you may have problems, we had only one bag and kept our clothes in it.... Breakfast: thay say it it an open buffet - I think it is rather an extended continental brakfast. One kind of bread , two kinds of cheese, boiled egg, corn flakes, tea, coffee, butter, jam, honey, cucumber, tomato, two kinds of olives, apple, orange. For two days we got a kind of frankfurter in a sauce - it was not good. Receptionists speaks english and they are helpful, waiter do not speak too much english ... If you like to stay in your room for a long time; if you have lots of baggages; if you want to dance in the room; if you like a buffet breakfast with a wide selection; if you want to spend your evenings in the hotel bar; if you want to swim - it is not your hotel. (Better to choose a 4-5 stars hotel for a much higher price) If you want to walk around in Istanbul, and only go to the hotel for bathing and sleeping in a clean room/bed, if you are satisfied with a simple breakfast, if you go out in the evenings, if you like to be near to almost everything, and if you want it all for a reasonable price, it's your hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location - that's about it for this one!!!”
Reviews.Author: KiwiCoupleAustria
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently had a five day break to Istanbul. I read the reviews on this hotel and thought I would take a bit of a chance thinking that a hotel room is hard to stuff up - unfortunately I was so wrong. For starters we booked a double room and were given a twin room on the first floor barely above street level. After asking to be moved we got our double room on the fourth floor. Things were looking up, until we went to bed. The A/C barely worked (I can only imagine what it would be like in high summer) so the window had to be kept open. Unfortunately a large truck seems to pass every five minutes so ear plugs were needed. The bed was very old and tired. We had to sleep on top of the duvet to stop the springs sticking into our backs. After one of the worst nights sleeps I have had for a long time we got up and hoped breakfast would help - unfortunately they managed to stuff this up as well. They tried to be European but it was horrible. Not enough seats, not enough milk, only cocoa pops for ceareal. No yoghurt and some chopped up sausage represented the meat on offer. We actually stopped going to breakfast and went up the street to a fantastic Turkish patisserie. The service was OK if you could find someone that spoke Engligh - but still their English was better than my Turkish. This hotel seems to be popular with German tour groups and a mixed age group. But for the price we paid I would certainly reccommend going elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Good value budget hotel in centre of city”
Reviews.Author: emptynesterBristol
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 nights in June. Convenient location within walking distance of all main sites and a tram stop. Our room was smallish and looked out on to a backyard but it was clean, cool and quiet. Breakfast was a Turkish-style buffet. While olives were not to our personal taste at breakfast, we enjoyed the boiled eggs, water melon and bread etc. Cereals were also available. We felt this hotel offers good value for money. Evening meals are available from countless restaurants nearby.

Reviews.Title: “good locatiuon very small room”
Reviews.Author: N_YorksRobin
Reviews.Content: We stopped for 4 nights in the Golden Crown Hotel yes a great location and a good price(Â£75 for 4 nights) but a very small room,continetal breakfast.....nothing exciting,the bar well.... never anybody in.Would recommend it on location could walk to most sights and a tram stop not far away.We travelled from the Airport via the tram/metro 1.40 turkish Lira.

Reviews.Title: “Our stay in Golden Crown”
Reviews.Author: Avtodor
Reviews.Content: A good price for excellent location. The hotel is situated in old city, close to Aya Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace. There is a supermarket in 50 metres. As for problems: the room we lived in was really very small, it was a little bit cold because the air-conditioner didn`t work properly. And the smell of tobacco in the room...

Reviews.Title: “Istanbul East meets West”
Reviews.Author: NettyNorfolk
Reviews.Content: Arrived in the rain and it was dark, initial reaction where on earth are we? Next morning realised we were perfectly positioned for all the sights. Walk down to the Bosphorus about 20 minutes everything else within that time. Hotel room was big enough, clean do you need more on a city break?

HotelInfo.Name: Golden Crown Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Piyer Loti str. No : 10 | Ã‡emberlitaÅŸ - Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34490, Turkey
